rules_text: Whenever you level up a creature, put an additional level counter on it.
flavor_text: [i]The Nullsigil Core is the Heap's oldest and most unfair dungeon. Open for 45 centuries, it has nine known clears.[/i]
notes:
A grindy deck that plays good removal, then takes over by leveling up its level up creatures quickly.
